Comment: A unique ID number for the location.
A short alphanumeric ID code for the location.
A descriptive name for the location.
This field contains 'Y' if the location is active.
This field contains 'Y' if the location's "Exclude from Valuation" option is ticked.
This field contains 'Y' if the location's "Exclude from Free Stock" option is ticked.
This field contains 'Y' if the location's "Exclude from Sales" option is ticked.
This field contains 'Y' if the location represents Work in Progress in EXO Job Costing.
